articles.title: 3 Reliable Dividend Stocks Yielding Up To 4.5%
articles.mainIdea: 3 Reliable Dividend Stocks Yielding Up To 4.5%
articles.summary: Simply Wall St.: 3 Reliable Dividend Stocks Yielding Up To 4.5%. As the U.S. stock market continues its upward trajectory with major indexes nearing record highs, investors are increasingly looking for stability amidst the tech-driven rally. In such a dynamic environment, dividend stocks offer reliable income and potential for steady growth, making them an attractive option for those seeking to balance risk and reward in their portfolios. Related tickers mentioned: CET, COLB, CZNC, DDS, EBF, FIBK, FMNB, OTCM, PEBO, PFS, SFD.

articles.title: PNC’s Early Move Into Direct Bitcoin Trading Might Change The Case For Investing In PNC (PNC)
articles.mainIdea: PNC’s Early Move Into Direct Bitcoin Trading Might Change The Case For Investing In PNC (PNC)
articles.summary: Simply Wall St.: PNC’s Early Move Into Direct Bitcoin Trading Might Change The Case For Investing In PNC (PNC). Earlier in December 2025, PNC Bank became the first major U.S. bank to enable eligible PNC Private Bank clients to buy, hold and sell spot bitcoin directly through its own digital platform, using Coinbase’s Crypto-as-a-Service infrastructure. This move meaningfully expands PNC’s digital asset capabilities for high- and ultra-high-net-worth clients, tightening the link between traditional private banking services and the crypto market. We’ll now explore how this early move into direct bitcoin... Related tickers mentioned: BTC-USD, COIN.

articles.summary: HR Dive: Nearly half of US workers say they’ll need $1M or more to retire, spurring stress. Workers’ retirement hopes generally surpass their savings, which leads to growing anxiety about the future, a report finds.
